Paragraph.Text: The Quarry digs out the earth beneath it returning all resources found. Must be built above -25m. Resouces will be placed in attached storage hoppers.

TwoColumnParagraph.Left: Quarry Size: Quarry Depth: Power Required Power Capacity: Max. Power Recharge Rate: Max. Hardness Dug: Max. Dig Speed: Ore Extraction Efficiency:
TwoColumnParagraph.Right: 9m x 9m 3950 150 per 1m cube 4096 1024 per second 250 5 cubic meters per second 10%
